features: ★【Superior Home Theater Projector 】 -- Vamvo Mini Projector support 1920x1080P, is equipped with 1000:1 contrast.Excellent color reproduction, depicts a clear and vivid picture. The subtle expressions can't escape your eyes, bring you and your family immersive home theater experience.

★【High Brightness & Large Screen Size Experience】 -- The video projector provides the projection sizes from 40" to 100" according to the distance (3 -16 feet). Recommend the best projection size is 80-100 ", Built-in 2W speakers provide original audio fidelity and crystal clearness. The sound quality can meet your daily needs even without external speakers. The portable projector is not only suitable for watching movies, but also for playing games and watching sports.

★【Real Portable Movie Projector】 -- Mini projector for iphone has small size , weighs only 0.75 pounds, And the Vamvo art projector supports DC and charging treasure power supply mode, you can use Mobile Phone Charger, Car Charger or Power Pack Via Micro-USB Interface (Need to Support 5V / 2A) to power it. Let you build your own theater as you like, No matter where you are, you can enjoy a great movie night with your family and friends.

★【Multimedia Connection】 -- This iphone projector is equipped with multiple easy-to-use ports, including HDMI, USB, AV input interface, and audio. You can easily connect it with TV stick, PS4, Chromecast, PC and laptop. When connecting a smartphone, an additional Lightning/Micro USB/Type C/ to HDMI adapter is required. (Adapter Not included)

★ 【Lifetime Professional Technical Support】 -- Vamvo small projector offer one of the best overall projector warranties in the industry, with a 90-day refund and lifetime free customer support. Buy for you without risk. For any product questions, please don't hesitate to email us. We are always ready to provide you with satisfactory solutions.
body.description: In terms of color, the Vamvo projector uses white and silver combination, which perfectly reflects its sense of high -level and technology. It can be seen from the shape that its size is only 5.51 "*3.78"*2.13 ". But its maximum projection size range reaches 100 ". In terms of performance, this mini projector supports 1080P, the brightness has been upgraded and the contrast has reached 1000: 1. The built -in 2W speaker is provided to provide the original audio preservation and video clarity. At the same time, it is also equipped with multiple easy-to-use ports. The projector can support the connection of game consoles, stereos and other equipment to unlock more entertainment. No need to cast screen software, no need to worry about complicated operations.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Light Luxury Mini Projector, Bring You a Family Cinema Experience

In terms of color, the Vamvo projector uses white and silver combination, which perfectly reflects its sense of high -level and technology. It can be seen from the shape that its size is only 5.51 "*3.78"*2.13 ". But its maximum projection size range reaches 100 ". In terms of performance, this mini projector supports 1080P, the brightness has been upgraded and the contrast has reached 1000: 1. The built -in 2W speaker is provided to provide the original audio preservation and video clarity. At the same time, it is also equipped with multiple easy-to-use ports. The projector can support the connection of game consoles, stereos and other equipment to unlock more entertainment. No need to cast screen software, no need to worry about complicated operations. Accessories included in the package VF270 Projector*1 Power supply*1 User's manual*1 Infrared remote control*1 HDMI cable (for computer only)*1 3 in 1 video cable*1

Convenient Mobile Phone Connection When connecting with iPhone, you only need to add extra lightning to HDMI adapter. (not included)When connecting with Android mobile phones, you only need an additional Micro USB/ Type C to HDMI adapter. (not included)

Advanced Speakers, Low Noise Do you still mind that the noise of many projectors is too much and seriously affected to watch? Now, the Vamvo mini projector uses more advanced cooling technology and is equipped with almost perfect built-in surround speakers. You do not need to connect other speakers and reduce the cooling noise to less than 30 decibels to bring you an immersive movie viewing experience.

Flexible Charging Method The mini projector for iphone is suitable for various occasions, but what if the projector runs out of power when using it outdoors? Don't worry, you can use the power bank to power the projector and continue enjoying your outdoor movie party. (NOTE: The output voltage/current of the power bank cannot be lower than 5V/2A, and the power bank is not included.)

Lightweight & Portable, Convenient to Carry Mini portable projector can be easily used in any scene, providing an excellent audiovisual experience for you and your family and friends anytime, anywhere. There are more use scenarios waiting for you to discover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I have always wanted a nice projector with excellent features that will be suitable for home entertainment. So, I went ahead and ordered this projector, and all I can say is excellent! I am well pleased with this unit, it is exactly what I would expect out of a projector.The installation was pretty easy because in no time I had it up and running. I tested this with a USB drive, and I was able to access the files on it, and then using my laptop with the HDMI cable to watch movies.Picture quality is great.The image is sharp and vibrant, and the brightness is surprisingly better. It also came with an HDMI cable at no extra cost. The display is very clear, bright and sharp.It’s nice and bright on my wall with the curtains closed and even with a bit of ambient light from a skylight has a good bright picture.Some of the most outstanding features include high-quality images. It has a contrast of 3000:1 that is impressive if put against its price. It has an upgraded powerful LED light source that makes it deliver bright images. I don’t have to keep the blinds closed when watching my favorite movies.It runs really cool, after a 2 hour movie it is barely warm. The fan is not loud, and I didn't even notice it during the movie.The speaker is much more than I expected, it is clear and has decent sound on its own.This projector plays all video formats.I like its design which is amazing, and the color is exactly what I wanted, jet black. It is indeed attractive and super good.Overall, great value for the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You have to buy this now. Stop searching
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. After much research I decided to purchase this projector. It took me about a month to make my decision because every projector I looked at had several reviews that seemed like nightmares. I pulled the trigger on this one because of the great reviews, and high valued customer support remarks.Let me tell you; this has been one of the best purchases I have ever made. I use it every weekend for movie night by the pool. I love it, the kids love it, and the projector itself is a high quality product. The clarity and picture is excellent. The sound from the speakers is excellent; however, if your making a bunch of noise just by an aux cord, and hook it up to a louder speaker system. I had a JBL waterproof speaker which is very loud, and we can make as much noise as we want while watching our movies.On top of everything, set up takes about 2 minutes as we have thousands of movies on an external harddrive that we just plug into the back of the projector.If your in the market for a projector, don’t waste your money elsewhere. Buy this one because it will last, its great quality, and for the price it’s a steal. Buy this now, quit searching, you won’t regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's worth it. But...
reviews.reviewText: You will like because of the cost:quality ratio.It's cheap and it's really cool if you have never had a projector before. There isn't like having a 6'x8' motion picture on your wall. The picture quality is almost compatible to the old plasma screens that would blow your mind back in the day.Though the richness fades the further back you go and fade is by half during the day. You need blackout curtains if your planning to use it as main tv.I have a 4k fire stick and it looks good but....Here's the skinny....if your looking into these and want to get your feet wet ..this is nice...however, this was an impulse buy for me. It's really got me interested in seeing what the cost:detail ratio is on a brighter, more options and sound quality would do. say, would buying one that is 10k lumens be better or more detailed like a actual tv. In some cases its just as nice as a maybe a udh tv but thats a push or more like just sitting in a fast car. You feel like your going faster than you really are.So, really, this model is good for the money in the price range for what your plans are. Like are you just web surfing or are you gaming? Not Facebook gaming. Gamers are not so much surfers. If you think your a gamer because you play games your not a gamer. That's the point I'm getting at and that's pretty much the thought process in these shopping options.Buying a $60 projector thinking your a videophile then, being disappointed because it's not something that flows like a regular tv is all on you. But, buying a high end one thinking it's the be all end all to your viewing fascinations has diminishing returns that will leave you with regret later. As you see the price goes from as low as $30 to over even a $2000+. There isn't a happy medium when your thinking more expensive means better quality.I like it and $60 for something that works way better than the last pair of shoes I bought and lasts longer is a deal to me. It just doesn't beat picking up a perfect $3600 massage chair being thrown out on bulk pick up day all because the tracks for the motor cracked and fell out. All I did was jb weld them in and now I got a awesome anti gravity full body massage chair I almost don't deserve. I feel bad for the people but, I don't remember who's house I got it from. Eh..thems the brakes...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good sound and quality for smaller rooms
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My room is a small room from where I set the projector to where it hits the wall it’s about 16ft and the quality is great. It’s not distorted or pixilated.Sound is great as well again I have a smaller room so it does sound great no need for a speaker system or sound bar.Now I bought a fire stick and it’s compatible and I also was able to us the HDMI cable that came with. Here are some pictures and videos of how it sounds. Also I would suggest to buy a tripod for it so it may rest easy on a self or table.
